"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"7","verse":"2"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"2"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"7","verse":"2"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"A certain centurion’s servant, who was dear to him, was sick and at the point of death. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"7","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"3"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"7","verse":"3"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"When he heard about Jesus, he sent to him elders of the Jews, asking him to come and save his servant. went with them. When he was now not far from the house, the centurion sent friends to him, saying to him, "}],"object":"text"}],"object":"block","type":"speech"},{"data":{"color":"blue","recipient":"Jesus","source":"A Roman Officer\u2019s Friends","time_period":["0s AD"],"unique_recipients":["Jesus"],"unique_sources":["A Roman Officer\u2019s Friends"]},"nodes":[{"leaves":[{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"7","verse":"6"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"“Lord, don’t trouble yourself, for I am not worthy for you to come under my roof. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"7","verse":"7"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"7"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"7","verse":"7"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"Therefore I didn’t even think myself worthy to come to you; but say the word, and my servant will be healed. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"7","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"8"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":1},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Government"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"7","verse":"8"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"For I also am a man placed under authority, having under myself soldiers. "},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"7","verse":"45"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"},{"object":"mark","type":"verse"}],"object":"leaf","text":"45"},{"marks":[{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Celebration"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Economics"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Education"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Family"},{"data":{"portion":2},"object":"mark","type":"Religion"},{"data":{"book":"Luk","chapter":"7","verse":"45"},"object":"mark","type":"reference"}],"object":"leaf","text":"You gave me no kiss, but she, since the time I came in, has not ceased to kiss my feet.
